message.raw:
Fixed a bug on fresh 64bit windows installs (both win7 and win8) where 32-bit enthough+PyGTK+matplotlib(with GTK support) crash when adding analyses to lyse.

Apparently you need to import gtk before importing matplotlib.pyplot
We don't know why!

We don't know why!
